sense.def:
Z izrazoma
thanks
in
thank you
izrazimo hvaležnost, ko nekdo naredi nekaj za nas ali nam nekaj da.

seg.quote: Many thanks for your long and interesting letter.
‘What'll you have, Castle? A whisky?’—‘A small one, thank you.’

sense.def:
To thank someone
pomeni izraziti hvaležnost nekomu za nekaj.

seg.quote: He thanked me for bringing the books.

sense.def:
To express one's thanks to someone
pomeni izraziti hvaležnost nekomu za nekaj.

seg.quote: He sent a letter of thanks to Haldane.

sense.def:
Izraze
thank God
,
thank goodness
ali
thank heavens
uporabljamo, kadar si močno oddahnemo zaradi nečesa.

seg.quote: Thank goodness it only lasts an hour.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
thanks to another thing or a person
, je tista druga stvar ali oseba vzrok, da se je zgodilo.

seg.quote: Thanks to him I began to learn to trust my feelings.
The building became very well known, thanks to detective films.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
thanks all the same
se zahvalimo nekomu za ponudbo, ki je ne sprejmemo.

seg.quote: ‘Do you want a lift?’—‘No, but thanks all the same.’
